forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Low around 68, with temperatures rising to around 70 overnight. North northeast wind around 6 mph.

forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Isolated Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Mostly sunny. High near 91, with temperatures falling to around 88 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 1 to 6 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

Low around 67, with temperatures rising to around 69 overnight. Southwest wind 1 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
